output.rewritten_email:
Subject: Compliance Check-In

Dear Team,

This is a reminder to ensure that all regulatory submissions are current and compliant with applicable guidelines. Please review your documentation to confirm that all required filings are up to date and accurately reflect our operational practices.

Additionally, ensure that any changes in product specifications or processes are documented and reported in accordance with regulatory requirements. 

Please provide a status update on your compliance activities by the end of the week.

Thank you for your attention to this matter.

Best regards,

[Your Name]  
[Your Position]  
[Your Contact Information]

input_text: This drug is 100% safe and has no side effects

output.rewritten_email:
Subject: Safety and Side Effects of the Drug

Dear [Recipient],

This communication serves to inform you that the safety profile of the drug has been evaluated in accordance with regulatory standards. All data from clinical trials and post-marketing surveillance will be made available for review. It is important to note that while adverse effects have been reported, they are within the expected range as outlined in the product's labeling. 

For further information, please refer to the attached documentation detailing the safety assessments and reported side effects.

Best regards,
[Your Name]
[Your Position]
[Your Organization]

Subject: Availability of Test Results

Dear [Recipient],

This is to inform you that the test results for [specific test or product name] are now available for review. Please ensure that all relevant compliance protocols are followed when accessing and utilizing this data. 

For any inquiries or further information regarding the test results, please refer to the appropriate regulatory documentation or contact the compliance department directly.

Best regards,
[Your Name]
[Your Position]
[Your Organization]
